title: ItsOn CEO and Wireless Pioneer Greg Raleigh to Speak at GSMA Chief Strategy Officer Workshop in Silicon Valley
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 3:45 PM   ItsOn 
REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ItsOn today announced that CEO Dr. Greg Raleigh will speak at the GSMA Chief Strategy Officer Workshop in Silicon Valley on Friday, September 11. Dr. Raleigh will present a case study, "Making Software Defined Networks pay - leveraging virtualization to accelerate innovation in areas spanning from service provisioning through to marketing." The presentation will illuminate where and how operators can uncover the largest competitive advantage from virtualization, and the value of providing digital experiences to customers. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150910/265531LOGO 
As mobile operators strive to increase customer loyalty and market share through innovative enhanced consumer experiences, the GSMA is facilitating this workshop to uncover and discuss best practices and real-world examples so it can educate its mobile operator members. Dr. Raleigh's presentation, scheduled on Friday at 10:45 a.m., will demonstrate the value of virtualizing policy and billing functions, while also outlining ItsOn's own experience working with operators to deliver this new class of digital experiences. Dr. Raleigh will speak in front of executives from the most recognizable operators in the world, including Vodafone, Verizon and AT&T. 
GSMA produces the most prestigious events in the mobile space, including Mobile World Congress, Mobile World Congress Shanghai and the Mobile 360 Series conferences. The Chief Strategy Officer Group acts as a "think tank" for the GSMA on strategic issues. 
Who : Dr. Greg Raleigh, CEO and founder of ItsOn 
What : Case study: "Making Software Defined Networks pay - leveraging virtualization to accelerate innovation in areas spanning from service provisioning through marketing" 
When : Friday, September 11 at 10:45 a.m. 
To request a meeting at the event, please email itson@inkhouse.com . 
About ItsOn 
ItsOn is a proven leader in the wireless industry, and enables wireless operators to fundamentally change how mobile services are marketed, delivered and consumed. The company was founded in 2008, launched the world's first end-to-end solution for virtual policy and billing in 2014 and supports key carrier accounts such as Sprint and Virgin Mobile. ItsOn investors include Andreessen Horowitz, Tenaya Capital, Vodafone Ventures and Verizon Investments. The company is privately held and headquartered in Redwood City, CA. For more information, please visit www.itsoninc.com or follow @ItsOnInc on Twitter.
